content.detailedDescription:
Beverly saw the object first as they were heading out to breakfast. dennis also saw the object. it took about 4 minutes from the time they saw the object and then took picture with i-phone camera. they started looking at it at 9:10 am.  i seemed to be about 4 miles off-shore. it was not a sea plane. the binoculars they used was 10 x 50mm strength. you could see it was something hover over the water once the got the binoculars. it then took off away from the witness toward the horizon. the total amount of time they saw the object was about 20 minutes. the picture was taken at 9:26 am.  not sure if the craft was sucking up water because it seem so strange. but that is what it looks like in the picture. i am attaching the screenshot of the picture but the witness will e-mail the original. dennis wears glasses but did not have them on him. when they used the binoculars they could tell it was definitely above water. at first they thought it may be a boat but not after they used the binoculars. 

about 2:00 pm on the 800 block on the same street they saw 2 military green helicopters that were side by side. the were surprise that they hovered over the neighborhood. they were heading east. the saw them hover for about 30 seconds. stop and go movements over the neighborhood. they said they have see helicopters going down the beach but they have never seen them hovering over the houses.
content.summary: Ufo seen hovering over ocean an sucking up water

content.detailedDescription: Two sets of three glowing lights, in the formation of west-facing arrows, were observed floating above afton, mn before slowly moving westward. after gradually disappearing, a third set of lights appeared from the same spot in a vertical zig-zag pattern, before gradually disappearing.
content.summary: 11-12 floating orbs/lights were spotted in two different formations (two horizontal arrows and a vertical zig-zag).

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Four of us witnessed while driving south west near jordan river/sooke vancouver island bc between 8 and 9 pm.Noticed it was a bright glowing orange object and was hovering above the water. we pulled over to see what it was as you could tell it was not a star because of the shape and colour of it against the backdrop of the night sky. at first being skeptical, we tried to deduce what it was - maybe chinese lantern, or helicopter? after watching it for about 30 min in which time we witnessed it hovering, then changing colours and moving abruptly from side to side then shooting straight up and then straight down and at time wobbling we realized it was nothing we ever seen before. we have video and pictures taken with our cell phones when blown up show a glowing white orb with a dense center. we were skeptical at first until we seen its actions then were frightened especially when it looked like it was coming towards us. it eventually disappeared tree level in the olympic mountains. just before it disappeared another object the same appeared lower just above the water and just hovered there. an airplane flying well above these objects was noticed also but looked like a regular passenger plane with lights blinking.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object observed near jordan river area bc near olympic mtn. object changed colours and flight patterns abruptly and hovered.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to my garden to light a smoke looked up as i do usually do at night.This huge triangle made up of other lights within the triangle went by at freightning speed. it was huge it must have passed right over dublin airport  because im beside the airport it scared the c..P out of me. it was like the british red arrows doing a routine formation but it wasent it was made up of lights a triangle. not a sound did it make it glided across the sky. wow. never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Huge triangle made up of lights

content.detailedDescription: I was walking lola, my little yorkie and talking to my friend on the phone, when i saw a red light up above me it was about half a minute when i told my friend i needed to take a picture of it and i would call her back,.. using the video in my phone to record it. i was moving south, and i noticed the light from the west it started movin erratically and changing colors, from red to white and also sizes and shapes, when it finally stopped, it was moving very slow towards the east almost hiding behind a very tall tree, i followed around with my camera, until it faded away and disappear. i really don't know what i was feeling i just knew that whatever i was seeing it wasn't normal, i was a little bit confused  but something in me said i needed to take picture, believe it or not i kinda put it out of my mind until i saw the video again, then i knew i had to share it but i didn't really know how to go about it i felt funny telling people (i have a video of a ufo).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I noticed a round red and white  pulsating light up above my head it seemed to be observing me and following me across my path from west to the east

content.detailedDescription: 4 and a half years studdying the ufos in and around ojai. they are still up there in way more abundence of what they are. i dont even have to serch hard for them they are everyware. for some reason everyone lost there pashion for them but not me , my pashion runs deep. about a month ago i got hit by something in the nigjht were i lost my thought my pashion my helth.By some kind of artafishal telepathy weapon and alot of other people have been hit by the same weapon. its realy scary and there is no defence against it. and i know who is useing it on myself and others and i know why.Those people that know about ufos or that are doing wrong in the eyes of the people that are useing the weapons and that is so wrong cause it takes away peoples pashion
content.features: Dome,  Patterned Surface,  Appendage(s),  Louvres,  Wings
content.summary: There here in the foot hills and deeper into the mountains of ojai calif 93023 there has to be some way to report them

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in house watching tv,saw light out back door went outside bright orange object coming out of sw no idea what it was it as heading ne, ran thru house got cell phone out of pocket tryed to call son no answer,yelled at wife in living room to come out,we were able to see it disappear in ne.Object made no sound that i could hear shaped like a pill capsule. when we turned around saw bright white light almost over head coming from nw to se wife and i both thought it looked like space station, see today it was.     orange light looked at least 10 times bigger than space station but have no idea how far away it was.Never saw any thing like this before sure would like to know what it was,had to be a lot of people see this.
content.summary: Saw light went outside watched it come from sw to ne and disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
At 1:30 am i awakened from the flashing and moving of lights through my blinds. got up noticed 1/2 moon, couple of stars and usual activity of helicopters (path from morse/hamilton around new albany area they usually circle in day and evening.  generally 3-5 helicopters and some small planes most evenings. i noticed to the right side one helicopter was brighter like a star east of the rooftop of building behind me. it appeared to move behind the building sideways in straight line so i put on glasses and checked the time on my phone 1:47 am. this light was brighter and didn't have the red blinking light of other helicopters. although the light was facing me it moved slowly from east to se ( compass 129 degree se. it stopped over the rooftop(left side) , emitting light like a star. after a few minutes i decided to time it to see how long this helicopter stayed in place.

at 2:02 am it still hadn't moved but i was aware bobbling and wobbling like a top (not a helicopter) & not like a star.  i was aware of bright light flashes coming from the top & as the light hit the clouds around it i noticed it was definitely round orb like, and although it was clear outside small clouds were around the parameter of it (a small space of no clouds around it, then small clouds around that space). it would emit a red or green light that wasn't evident until the light bounced off the cloud.

at 3:07 am, a red thin flash like a lazer beam shot out of the bottom, but when it hit a cloud below it didn't go through the cloud it rippled across both sides of the cloud. that was interesting. this happened within seconds and only once.  i became aware of several very tiny stars i had not noticed next to it, but as i blinked were gone. 

at 3:10 am the object shot to left about 2 feet, then shot to right, then up and down and then stopped all within the area i was watching. it just seemed to hover and wobble in place. at 3:38 am i decided to go back to bed. it was not there the next when i woke up or the next night.

i wish i had had binoculars.  there have been military helicopters in the area during the daytime so this may be a test flight area for new equipment.  but it was unlike the helicopters i have seen.
content.summary: Awakened by light movement thru window blinds. observed what at first appeared a helicopter stop at 129 degree se from 1:30 am to 3:38 am remain in one spot hovering/wobbling, emitting light.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside around 7:15 pm saw a bright star like object thought it was a star at first then saw it moving very slow so i got my video camera out and started filming, i have seen them a number of times in my area they very in color some are white some are red and some are multi-color. the video is zoomed in x40.
content.summary: I was outside around 7:15 pm saw a bright star like object.

content.detailedDescription: I live in the west valley of phoenix in laveen at 33∘22'59"n, 112∘10'30"w. this morning while on the back porch facing due east at approximately 0806, i saw what appeared to be an object well above the flight pattern reflecting the morning sun on a heading just slightly south of due west. my home is in the primary flight path for sky harbor, so commercial aircraft are a frequent and constant sight. aircraft overflying phoenix at altitudes above 20,000 feet heading westward in the same approximate area as the ufo i saw are also a common, everyday occurrence. as an avid sky-watcher i keep binoculars close at hand (tasco 7x35), and the apparent lack of traditional aircraft features and contrails piqued my curiosity. on the horizon at first glimpse the object was reflecting the sun, appeared roughly the size of a baby aspirin, and was traveling at a rate consistent with high flying aircraft, but slower than satellite traffic. through the binoculars the object was approximately dime-sized, apparently metallic with a highly reflective surface, and clearly discernible as a perfect sphere. no visible wings, no contrails, no heat signature - just a highly polished, metallic sphere that i kept in the binoculars for roughly 3-5 seconds.  when the object was 15 degrees east of being directly overhead, i grabbed my iphone to capture an image, maintaining eye contact with the steadily moving object, then watched it vanish instantaneously. i had roughly 30 degrees of visibility before the object would've been blocked by my home, and quickly ran to the rear of my yard which affords a full view of the objects westward path. visibility was open with only the faintest hint of clouds, and the entire western horizon was devoid of any aircraft whatsoever.  i could still clearly identify commercial aircraft to the north and east in the pattern, but the object i'd been following simply disappeared.  i grew up around military aircraft, served in the marines and also in the air force as a c-130 loadmaster. i am very familiar with commercial and military aircraft, and have been trained as a professional observer. this object was highly visible, and did not appear to possess any characteristics of any aircraft i've ever seen before, nor did it resemble high-altitude weather balloons, which i've seen on numerous occasions. it was visible in one instance, then gone without a trace in the next.  truly remarkable sighting, and i hope i wasn't the only one in phoenix to catch a glimpse of it.
content.summary: Object glimpsed above eastern horizon moving westward, reflected morning sun.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside around 7:15 pm saw a bright star like object thought it was a star at first then saw it moving very slow then i got my video camera out and started filming, i have seen them a number of times in my area they very in color some are white some are red and some are multi-color
content.summary: I was outside around7:15 pm saw a bright star like object thought it was a star at first then saw it moving very slow then i got my video camera out and started filming

content.detailedDescription: Watching two eagles flying then spotted higher up a pulsating cigar shaped object. i filmed a few secs of it but was hard to see in the camera and i did not think i got it until i reviewed the video later. but it was slow and gliding then changed direction pulsating or reflecting the sun, not sure it was weird looking. attached is the video. you decide. you will see how high it is cause birds fly by as i'm filming this thing. my wife was watching a good half house and it hovered direct over us and seemed to slow down and just stay where it was.
content.summary: Watching two eagles flying then spotted higher up a pulsating cigar shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving  home from (west) the gym at approx 6:30 p.M. - 7:40 p.M. when i noticed 3 distinct lights in a row hovering without any movement over tree tops in my neighborhood - white, red, blue.  i drove up the street and stopped next to it - it didn't move.  it was approx. the size of a small house (lenght) or the size of 2 school buses.  it was approx 500 ft away from me and no more than 400 ft. in elevation. it made no sound (i turned off music in my car and opened window).  it was a dull gray or putty color, and had a slight curved bottom contour - i could not see the top of it bc of my close proximity to it, but i think it was slim sized.  i live about 8 miles from davis-monthan afb, so i know how the military jets, planes, helipcopters, etc. look like.  the object did not have wings, fins, tail, rotors, propellers, landing gear, antennas, windows, markings or lettering or any kind. 

after the object hovered for a few minutes, it "glided" very slowly to the north.  i followed it in my car driving approx 10-15 mph.  i thought it was headed toward a park at the end of the street that was highly illuminated with stadium lights bc there was a loud event occurring, but it did not fly directly over it, just by the park headed north. i was mesmerized and my heart was pounding, although i did not feel endangared...I lost sight of it as it glided off (and slowyly ascended) to the north, toward the catalina mountains.
 
the next day i called the community relations number at davis-monthan afb to inquire if they had flown a weather balloon, blimp, or surveillance craft over the my neighborhood the evening prior, but they stated they do not have that sort of craft.  nothing in the news the next day.

i wonder if anyone in tucson filed a similar report?   
can this sighting be rationally explained?
content.summary: Really large and hovering over neighbourhood;  glided very slowly to the north.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside around 7:15 pm saw a bright star like object thought it was a star at first then saw it moving very slow then i got my video camera out and started filming, i have seen them a number of times in my area they very in color some are white some are red and some are multi-color
content.summary: I was outside around7:15 pm saw a bright star like object thought it was a star at first then saw it moving very slow then i got my video camera out and started filming

content.detailedDescription:
At 7:55 am i was walking my dog when i saw a strange craft flying overhead to the west. i thought it was a drone, it was silver was long and had short wings closer to the tail then the nose. a minute later another was following it at the same altitude in the same direction. they reflected silver from the morning sun and left no comtrail like other commercial jets off in the distance. then i saw a third, same direction, same altitude.
   i went home and got my brother and told him to look and then we saw a fourth flying in the same direction. i had my binoculars this time and looked at it. it has two engines by its rear tail, like a learjet. but it looked longer and the wings were swept back. not a drone, although i will research what they look like. 
    but then i noticed very high up, a white orb extremely high up. it never moved and i kept my eyes on it. i thought it might be a very bright star but ive never seen one this late. i looked at it for 5 minutes and it never moved, this was until about 8:05 am. i thought maybe it was a weather balloon, but the odd jets made me wonder if it wasnt something else.
content.summary: I witnessed four jets, i thought they were drones at first until i used binoculars. then i saw a white orb very high up

content.detailedDescription: We were up on our balcony and looking out at the ball of light thats there almost every night and noticed it changed to what look like 3 lights again. it then turned vertical and red and had like a nucleus appearance to it with numbers of lights. like a pillar of alot of red lights with a another red light spinning around it like a atom symbol. it was very strange, we had a perfect view of it through the binoculars and got a pretty good shot of it with the video camera
content.summary: Started out as a bright ball then stirng of lights then pillar with lights flying around it

content.detailedDescription:
Tijuana, baja californina, mexico
time: 21:00 hrs
equipment: motorola atrix hd smartphone
environment: city at night, very close to a marriott hotel, and pemex gas station
weather: cloudy but good view on the video

1. i was going out of my shift at work on a place close to the marriott hotel and the hippodrome in tijuana,b.C. mexico.

2.Some people on a pemex gas station were capturing video in front of me with their phones the phones were capturing video pointing to the sky towars the north west. i realise that something big was happening, then i grabbed my smartphone to start capturing this video.

3.I found out that there was some " orbs " glowing like a star on orange color up on the night sky...

4.No noise around them, there was about 6 objets on diferent positions, moving towars the sky... a ufo objet pass by from north to south on the video, but i did not soo it on the naked eye, only on the phone screen during the capture of the video.

5.This is my 2nd sighting on my life, good felling about the shinning light moments... ( my 1st one was at playas de tijuana around 1992, this time were hundreds of silver orbs up on the sky over thousands of feets )

5.I was locky to capture 1 min aprox. of this sighting. don't know if it lasted more time. cheers ;)

content.detailedDescription: Walking out onto my pier, i experienced a glowing meteor that exploded and disintegrated emitting a bright white and green light. it lasted for no more than 1 second. i am on the east coast united states facing the atlantic ocean. it looked similar to the meteor that was filmed in russia that actually made landfall. i stood around to see if any other  meteors were around and didn't see any after a 10 minute period.
content.summary: Meteor

content.detailedDescription: Traveling south hwy101 at approximately 9:10pm on oct 26th as we exited on carpinteria ave my wife looked out the passenger window and asked what the two orange lights were over the beach. i slowed the vehicle and saw two orange orbs in a stacked formation, one on top of the other. they appeared to be hovering. we pulled over next to a warehouse building just off the off ramp and watched as the top orange light flashed then disappeared. the second orb appeared to move further out towards the ocean. it flashed and began to dim then went on and off then flased really bright before finally disappearing altogether. it maintained roughly the same altitude throughout the sighting.
content.summary: Two orange orbs hovering then moved away from beach then flashed and went out

content.detailedDescription:
I am from the east coast (ct) visiting a childhood friend in albuquerque, nm (from thursday, 10/24 through 10/28/13).

after finishing dinner at the pf changs restaurant (at 4440 the 25th way ne, albuquerque, nm) on sunday, 10/27/13, my friend and i headed to the parking lot when my friend noticed a very bright light hovering in the sky over the general area above the roof of a hotel (i think a drury inn?) in the same parking lot. we stood for about a minute or two debating what we were looking at, since when focusing on two points on the hotel's roof the light wasn't moving. so we decided to get in the car and decided to head sw in the direction of the light outside the city limits where the light pollution was less. it was odd because it was hazy/some cloud cover in the night sky and the stars weren't many, and the ones that were visible in this parking lot weren't that bright. so this light dominated the sky even in a well-lit parking lot and was rather big and round in appearance. we noted the time on the car clock as 7:58 p.M. (mt) when we got into the car.

we headed up paseo del norte (road) heading west in my friend's car. as my friend was driving we noticed planes flying in the sky and they were distinctly smaller, had the typical red and blue blinking lights, and less bright than this light which appeared stationary and unwavering in the night sky.

so, as my friend drove her car, i kept my eye on the light so as not to lose its orientation in the sky. the planes appeared to fly under or around the bright light, but it was the planes in the foreground and background that made it clear this wasn't an airplane. and as the planes moved, this light did not.

we stopped at a sharp curve in this road which is the perimeter to a local airfield (double eagle?). there are no streetlights at this point and this area is considered "behind the volcanoes" which, i guess, means something to you if you're from this area. (it's a dark area from which to view the albuquerque "valley" and see the entire city from a terrific perspective.)

the photos i took are not really very good. these were taken with a panasonic lumix f 2.8 25-600 mm camera, which i had on me in a backpack for my visit with my friend and her family, as well as to capture our day outings in and around the albuquerque area. the photos simply show a bright light. it's odd because there was no moon visible in the sky tonight and this object, to the naked eye changed colors to include flashes of bluish-green, red orange and yellow before descending below an apparent cloud cover, as the light lit up a layer of low clouds making the light a muted, warm orange, and making it apparent that this light was descending behind/below the cloud cover. finally, even the warm bright light wasn't visible as even a muted light in the sky and we drove to my friend's home in the albuquerque area.

we thought maybe a weather balloon? do they emit bright lights that appear constant? did anyone else see this tonight?
content.summary: Saw very bright light in the sw sky outsde city limis of albuquerque, nm

content.detailedDescription:
It was fourth of july 2013 approximately 9:45 pm. it was just dark enough to observe fireworks displays so i went outside. i looked to the ne, and an unknown strange glowing object caught my eye. it wasn't acting like any normal firework, so i sprinted inside and grabbed my video camera. 
         when i came back outside and started recording, the light was slowly moving south from the north east, and was not making a sound unless it sounded like popping fireworks. i figured it to be moving maybe 2-5 mph tops. i was startled, and my heart was racing with questions. the more i watched this glowing pulsating red orange ball the more i began to realize it wasn't normal it wasn't a plane or helicopters. as i tried to follow the object with my camera, it was moving further away. then it just disappeared like a light switch.
          i watched the skies for another minute or so, when like a light switch, it was back due east and twice is high as before. i begin filming a second time but it was just too far away to capture any good quality as you will see in the first video.
          the object appeared to be 1/4 mile away and i could not determine size. from my vantage point it was the size of a tennis ball. when i first witness the object i knew it wasn't a firework because of its manorism, shape, and pulsating nature. it was mostly all red with a pulsating orange in the middle. seeing this object at first scared me but then i became 110% curious. i still would like to know what it was, as this incident remains in my daily thoughts. 
           the reason i am coming forward now is because i would like some answers, and if there is a 1% chance of this being a true ufo sighting, unlike my government i would like to make it public knowledge.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I went outside to watch fireworks displays, when a strange unknown object caught my eye.

content.detailedDescription:
July 19th, 2013. a bright white light passed by when i was on  my way home in the country. around 10 pm. it was about a half mile distant. i would estimate its size at 20 feet in diameter. it slowly passed from north to south and disappeared. my aunt who lives nearby said she also saw it. the next night i noticed bright lights in the sky. i used to enjoy stargazing so knew these weren't stars. the following nights sightings escalated. the bright white light in the west appeared, accompanied by two strobing white lights. there were also several strobing objects whose light changed red/green/blue. these were higher in the sky. i called my neighbor who met me at our property line. we watched the lights and figured they were really strange. the following night, he brought his wife along and we stood on the back of his truck and watched and counted many more objects scattered across the sky. we used binoculars. we counted 13 of the pulsing colored light objects. they seemed to be stationed about 15 miles apart. there were eight bright white lights in the sky, scattered apart. there were six strobing white lights across the sky. the next night i looked outside and saw the strobing colored light objects. they were across the sky and were stationary. i wasn't just scared, i was terrified. the next three nights i stayed in town. the bright white light to the west is still there, though not always in the same position. i don't go outside at night anymore, though i'll peek once in a while. sometimes i can spot one or more of the objects. there don't seem to be nearly as many as the time my neighbor and i watched. there has been unusual military aircraft activity which has not been seen in this area previously. there was an awacs plane with its fighter escort flying at a low altitude at twilight, a c-130 flying a curious pattern in daylight. there were three black/grey helicopters flying in formation from se/nw in the daytime. i finally screwed up the nerve to take pictures. i set the camera on a tripod with maximum zoom and set for night filming. i used the highest resolution. after converting the image to jpeg, i noticed the detail was about the same.
the photo of the rectangular shape with the strobe on the side was about 2 1/2 miles distant. i discovered the rectangular shape only after examining the photo. if i had to guess the height of the rectangle, i would say it would be close to 30 feet.
the photo of the bright light revealed a surprising feature. that is the halo surrounding the object. i had not seen that feature even with a spotting scope.
the last photo attached is the same as the above, but enlarged on the computer.
content.summary: This ufo has been in this general area over 3 months - finally took a picture

content.detailedDescription:
The morning of tuesday, october 22 i was waiting for the light to change at the intersection of brookfield drive and ann arbor saline road, facing south-east toward eisenhower.  at 9:20 am, i spotted what i first thought was a helicopter headed toward me, but as it approached i saw that it had no wings or rotors or any other visible attachments.  

as the object approached my position head on, it looked round, and was very dark or black.  it was not very large; perhaps as large as a volkswagen beetle.  

the craft came from the direction of the applebee's restaurant on west eisenhower parkway and made a sharp turn northeast so that it crossed the sky in front of me.  when it turned to parallel ann arbor-saline road, i saw that it was oblong, not round.  occasionally the rear third flashed silver.  it moved at a steady rate of speed, and kept about the same height above ground level.

i watched the craft for at least three or four minutes as i waited for a green light.  i lost sight of it as it moved into the sun's glare.
content.summary: A brief fly-by by a small, dark et craft.

content.detailedDescription: Riding down hwy 29 out of greenville,looked up out of winsheild of car and saw this triangle like object  floating in the air.Took picture while driving ,busy hwy with no place to pull over.There is a air force testing and repair in greenville called donaldson center.Figure this is where it came from.
content.summary: Hovering without any sound

content.detailedDescription:
1.) sitting on front porch.
2.) at first it seemed to be a very bright star.
3.) after observing it and taking pictures, noticed it was a small cluster of 4-6 extremely large and glowing spheres.
4.) very constant motion.  moving from north to south until it vanished.
5.) i was convinced it was something not of this world even before taking the pictures.
6.) object vanished under treeline.
content.summary: Tight cluster of extreamly large bright spears in southern night sky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were out in garden smoking a cig, when i noticed a bright object coming from nw, it was gliding like the speed of an airliner had small sideways motions l-r yet keeping path.
there were no sound, no blinking light as an airliner, but extreme bright at least twice or more than jupiter.
i ran to get my camcorder but i could not pick it up on cam, but i could see street lamp with it. seemed to as if the light were of other frequency that cam could not pick up. in steady speed it vanished in the direction se.
time of observation 7.55est 20mi west of indianapolis.
my first thought were it was plane, but it became very clear it was not, there were 2 airliners in flight both headed ne, one very high the other fairly low, those wing blinkers were so clear but none on this one.
altitude approx 1000feet, no sound at all just gliding over sky. ne to se.
content.summary: Appeared as very big bright star 2x jupiter

content.detailedDescription: I have deliberated writing this report. oh yes i have.... as this would now be 2 incidences for me in the past 10 days. i have waited for news reports of a helicopter crash, however nothing in the last 3 days has been reported. so.... i cannot not report what i saw during the early morning hours of october 26, 2013. and, i cannot believe that i would be the only one to have seen this (late fri night, early sat hours).   at approx 1:20 a.M. saturday morning (oct 26), i was lying in bed. my bedroom faces nw; my view is that of the ocean + ucla campus + 405 frwy sepulveda pass area. i live in a highrise and my view is second-to-none of the skies in that direction. i constantly see planes and helicopters flying around all day and all night. i have become accustomed to seeing police helicopters speeding in one direction or another all over westwood.... there seems to always be 'something' going on (additionally, there are emergency medical flights that constantly land on the rooftop of ucla med center). this particular evening, while late i was still awake lying in bed..... and i suddenly noticed a red blinking light fly over my building towards westwood/ucla (the incoming projectory was above my sliding glass door towards the westwood area... a norm that is seen very often). however, this time.... the projectory of the 'helicopter' was *going down fast*. i expected it to slow it's angled direction and steady itself over 'the incident'. this did not occur.... causing me to sit up in bed and watch what i thought was to be a helicopter crash somewhere in the vicinity of the fraternity houses on the other side of ucla. i watched as it still angled downward, i watched... i watched... and then bam! it hit!!!   while waiting, and staring, and waiting, the explosion that i expected did not happen. i kept waiting... still nothing. i floundered about wondering if i should call 911... still no explosion, and most importantly no fire engine sirens (i hear those constantly and am located very near two local fire engine companies). i kept waiting for sirens, kept waiting for a delayed explosion, kept waiting, kept waiting, and kept waiting. absolutely nothing.  from first sighting to 'what i call should have impacted' took probably about 8-10 seconds. i know what i saw.... a fast-moving blinking red light (that of my norm police helicopter in the area) with a projectory from above my building going way too fast and too angled not to have crashed. i promise to all those reading this.... i saw something, and something that should have crashed. while i heard 'no crash' and 'no explosion', i know what i saw. i saw what i thought to be a helicopter crashing. there is absolutely no 'ifs, ands, or buts' about it. i figured that the morning news would surely explain it all. i wanted to call someone, but who? and, i did not want to sound like an idiot to anyone i could have called since 1) there was no explosion, and 2) no sirens immediately after the fact.   my concern, my wonderings, my thoughts flooded my mind for at least an hour after that. i had pulled out my binocs but saw nothing in that direction immediately after-the-fact. even come daylight, i still saw nothing in that direction with binoculars.  on an ending note, what i saw was not a meteorite (there was not that familiar streak in the sky associated with a meteorite)..... nope, this was a blinking red light (that which i associate with a police helicopter) that came angling down into the ucla area and suddenly disappeared at ground level. no other colored lights, no solid lights, no noise, no explosion.  if *anyone else* saw the same thing that night.... please please make a report here!   i saw something waaay back when in my late teens, and i will never forget what i saw then. then, 10 days ago i watched for over an hour and a half -- an object that never moved in the sky during daylight hours. and now, yet another 'something'.  it took 30+ years to see 'something' a second time, and only 10 days later to see 'something' a third time.... waay to uncanny. i'd swear with a polygraph as to what i saw.... and still, even to this day, not a single report of a helicopter crash to confirm it. ten days ago, i had a witness to what i saw.... however, sadly this time.... it was just me.... and i'd give anything to know that someone else saw what i saw. i just cannot be alone in what i saw.... i am in the ucla westwood area and it being a late fri night/early sat a.M. ---- well, there just had to be others who witnessed the same thing..... and as of today, sadly there just ain't a single other report listed here :(
content.summary: Nightimefastmovingfallingredblinkinglight (lookedlikehelicopterredblinkinglight),angleddownwards20-30degreesincline.Appearedtocrashoveruclaarea.Verydarknocrashnoexplosionnoemergsirens4rescue.Notameteoritenoreportsofhelicoptercrash,somethingfell&crashed

content.detailedDescription: I was going west on hillcrest rd, i noticed a very bright silver object going east it was 1:55 pm on 10/24/2013, i pulled over to the side of the road, and saw the object speed up ,slow down, stop, make 90 degree turns.Another vehicle saw the object and pull over in front of me to watch. we watched almost two min. before the object made another 90 degree turn and speed off to the west at a high rate of speed
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Silver object , early afternoon, very bright in the sunlight, no cloud cover

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 6:30pm, my son and i were driving home from my brother house. i noticed a very bright light in the sky, that was extremely low, too low for a plane. i pointed it out to my son. we then observed a second similar bight object move close to the first, both appeared to be hovering and within a few hundred feet of each other. than one moved away swiftly to the north/west, another object then joined. we observed up to 3 or 4 objects moving in sync, then broke away, one remained above the road and seemed to follow us as we headed west. all these object were bright, very bright, and seemed to have random blinking lights, ability to hover, and move away at fast speeds, sometimes turning abruptly. we stopped the car to try to take a photo on our camera, but were only able to capture a bright object. at that same time, we called my brother to tell him, and talked briefly with him before my phone cut out it's signal. this incident took place as we traveled home in my car, from monroe, ct, through easton ct, to redding ct, a trip of about 30 minutes and we observed the objects for about 10-15 minutes of the trip. this occurred mainly on rock house road, but the objects seemed to be in the western sky over easton or redding.
when we first saw it, immediately it looked to bright for a star or plane and too low in the sky for a plane, and it's movements seemed too different than any plan could make. we did not hear any sound, even though we opened the window of the car. at the closest, the objects may have been 500 feet or more above the road. 
my son and i were certainly amazed as we watched, and a little scared about it. eventually all the objects moved and we could not see them.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My son and i observed up to 4 bright objects moving in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Wife was outside at 11pm and asked for me to hurry out. come now! i hurried out, all i saw was a wispy cloud going against the wind. unusual. the wispy cloud was long and elongated transparent. it was there for seconds then gone. we waited outside 15-20 minutes. we scanned the night sky with our eyes, nothing. then from the northeast a v-shaped transparent wispy cloud was moving slowly to the northwest. we watched as it went over our house about 150-200 feet above. it was transparent whitish v-shaped. we visualized it 20-25 seconds. then after waiting another 20 minutes, nothing else happened. we went into the house. it was cold.

two instances, one elongated wispy cloud like transparent and the other was v-shaped wispy cloud
content.summary: V-shaped wispy transparent cloud like
